title: Let’s Make Boxed Lunch!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Alright! Let’s start our menu meeting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What should we put in our lunch boxes for the next picnic with everyone?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I got one! Onigiri!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Noppo Bread!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Sandwiches!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>There’s no side dish, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Isn’t Noppo Bread a side dish?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe, it could be.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Then, what sides would go well with the main?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Karaage! Octopus-shaped wiener! Tamagoyaki!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Macaroni salad! Stir-fried broccoli!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Pickled plums!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Pickled plums!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Pickled plums are good to put in lunch boxes so the contents don’t spoil quickly zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I see~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Pickled plums and rice are a match made in heaven! When there’s a lunch box, pickled plums shall be there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>What a powerful statement zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
